attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877248209. This All-New top-of-the-range 7-seater Honda BR-V design presents a dynamic body shape with strong contour lines that accentuate the length of the vehicle. This latest BR-V model comes equipped with 5 year/200 000KM warranty and a 4-year/60 000KM service plan, along with 3 year AA Roadside assistance plan.

17” Black/Alloy Wheels • Synthetic Leather Upholstery • 2nd Row Seats Armrests • Walk-Away Auto Locking • 4.2" TFT Multi-Information Display • Body Coloured Shark Fin Antenna • Honda SENSING® Driver-Assist Technology • 6 Speaker Sound System • Auto-Headlights with Auto High-Beam • LaneWatch™ Blind Spot Camera • LED Front Fog Lights • Push-Button Start • Front Seat Armrests • Rear View Camera • Rear Parking Sensors • Smart Keyless Entry • Automatic Air Conditioning • Dual Front, Side & Curtain SRS Airbags

Please contact us to arrange a Taylor made Deal to match your pocket, trade-ins are welcome, and we pay top prices for good clean vehicles. Finance is available with all the major banks as we are an approved dealer.

attributes.description: For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877239317. DEMO CLEARANCE SALE. This bakkie is big, it is tough and it is practical with enough space inside to be comfortable and a big loadbox. The 2.2 engine is a beauty, lovely growl and very powerful engine. We provide RWC and a 160 multi-point Ford Approved quality check on all of our vehicles for your peace of mind. Call CMH Ford Gezina today to arrange a test drive with any of our professional and friendly sales executives. Any trade-in welcome, we guarantee R10,000 more on any written offer. Easy finance available within 3 hours. The price excludes dealer fees and smash and grab protection film. Errors and omissions Reserved. T&Cs apply.

attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877248209. The all-new HONDA FIT 1.5 Elegance CVT comes standard with a 4-year/60 000km service plan and a 5-year/200 000km warranty. Roadside assistance of 3 years/200 000km included. The driving experience of this vehicle is sleek and has a generous interior space. 

All five seats have three-point safety belts and seat-belt reminders. Other safety features include ABS, EBD, an electromechanical parking brake, stability/traction control, 6 x airbags, hill-start assist, cruise control, LED fog lamps, park distance control (front and rear) and a crystal clear display for the rearview camera

Please visit Honda Menlyn to FIND YOUR FIT trade-ins welcome, in-house finance arranged.

+ Optional 12 Month Warranty Available.

+ We Deliver Nationwide, we are based just 40 min from Johannesburg.

+ Finance can be arranged.

+ Trade-Ins Welcome.

Why you must buy from Koos & Mike Used Cars:

1. Our Prices includes on the road cost.(CASH BUYS)

2. All our cars comes with a roadworthy certificate.

3. All cars will be delivered with a oil service before delivery.

4. Paperwork is our priority and not your responsibility.

5. Finance approvals is our goal.

6. You are our customer our advertisement and our reference for tomorrow.

7. The first 5 services on the car will be half price.

8. Warranty option available on all our cars (not included in selling price, can be taken out additionally)

9. We buy decent cars for cash.

10. All our cars have cartrack pre-installed. (Ts & Cs apply)

11. You get 1 free Valet for your vehicle before delivery

12. We offer an optional warranty package on all our vehicles with an R 7990 - R 19 000 installment

13. Ts & Cs APPLY

Please contact us for vehicle availability before you waste time and money on transport (our stock sells fast)
